sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action deactivates a user.

Inputs:

  • User ID - ID of the user who is to be deactivated.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • Provided User ID is invalid or not found.
  • Invalid username or password/token or the token has expired.
  • The user does not have sufficient permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding First Advantage connection and credential must be created and associated with the First Advantage Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Deactivate User

Inputs:

Outputs:

Error Messages:

To use this action, the corresponding First Advantage connection and credential must be created and associated with the First Advantage Connection & Credential alias. Learn More
